Name: Roger
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Thick and very fruity - one for a summer's afternoon.
History: A popular drink in Venice, where it is made using the peach purée mix prepared for bellinis.
Nutrition: One serving of Roger contains 195 calories
